title: Darwin's Doubt and Intelligent Design - A Collection
description:
Darwin's Doubt and Intelligent Design - A Collection:

The recent advanced in biochemistry and genetics research has put considerable pressure on the evolutionists; many of them are now abandoning Darwinism and calling for new theories to explain evolution and the origin of life (check for example the Altenberg-16).

The books  in this collection examine the growing criticism to Darwin theory of evolution, and the increasing confidence in Intelligent Design. We have 23 titles in this upload; some of these titles are classics that were published many years ago, but many are recent ones that were published in the last 2 years.

-  Barash - Homo Mysterious; Evolutionary Puzzles of Human Nature (2012)

-  Bateman - The Mythology of Evolution (2012)

-  Behe - Darwin's Black Box; the Biochemical Challenge to Evolution (2006)

-  Deichmann & Travis (Eds.) - Darwinism, Philosophy, and Experimental Biology (2010)

-  Dembski - Intelligent Design as a Theory of Information (1998)

-  Dembski - The Design Revolution; Answering the Toughest Questions about Design (2004)

-  Dembski & Ruse (Eds.) - Debating Design from Darwin to DNA (2006)

-  Falk - The Fossil Chronicles; How Two Controversial Discoveries Changed Our View of Human Evolution (2011)

-  Gangestad & Simpson - The Evolution of Mind; Fundamental Questions and Controversies (2007)

-  Gregersen (Ed.) -  From Complexity to Life; On the Emergence of Life and Meaning (2003)

-  Jablonka & Lamb - Evolution in Four Dimensions; Genetics, Epigenetic, Behavioral, and Symbolic Variation in the History of Life (2005)

-  Johnson - NietzscheÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s anti-Darwinism (2010)

-  Knell - The Great Fossil Enigma; the Search for the Conodont Animal (2013)

-  Manson (Ed.) - God and Design; the Teleological Argument and Modern Science (2003)

-  Menon (Ed.) - Frontiers of Evolutionary Computation (2004)

-  Meyer - Darwin's Doubt; the Explosive Origin of Animal Life and the Case for Intelligence Design (2013)

-  Meyer - Signature in the Cell; DNA Evidence for Intelligent Design (2009)

-  Nagel - Mind & Cosmos; Why the Materialist Neo-Darwinian Conception of Nature Is Almost Certainly False (2012)

-  Pavlinov (Ed.) - The Species Problem; Ongoing Issues (2013)

-  Poole - A Comprehensive Introduction to Intelligent Design; Concepts and Theory (2012)

-  Stott - Darwin's Ghosts; the Secret History of Evolution (2012)

-  Yilmaz - Evolution, Science or Ideology (2008)


Note: Check also the content of an older upload that has the title: Creation vs Evolution.
